mapper.select: SELECT u.iuser, a.auth, u.upw, u.uid, firebase_token AS firebaseToken FROM t_user u JOIN t_auth a ON a.iauth = u.iauth WHERE u.uid = #{uid}

select P.iproduct, U.iuser, P.istatus as pistatus, PA.istatus from t_product P join t_user U on P.iuser = U.iuser and P.istatus IN (-1, -2) left join t_product_payment PP on PP.iproduct = P.iproduct left join t_payment PA on PA.ipayment = PP.ipayment AND PA.istatus IN (1, -1, -2, -3) where P.iuser = #{iuser} or PA.ibuyer = #{iuser}
select count(ichat) from t_chat_user where iuser = #{iuser}
mapper.delete: delete from t_chat_user where iuser = #{iuser} and istatus = -1
mapper.select: SELECT count(P.iproduct) FROM t_product P left JOIN t_product_payment PP ON P.iproduct = PP.iproduct left JOIN t_payment PA ON PP.ipayment = PA.ipayment AND PA.istatus not IN (1, -1, -2, -3) WHERE P.istatus not IN (-1, -2) AND P.iuser = #{iuser} OR PA.ibuyer = #{iuser}
